data.Name: Gostosa
data.Bio: The producer of all her tracks is Headhunterz. In this time of commercialization, true hardstyle souls believe that one day would destroy the very foundations of this beloved dance music. (the prediction) This day has already come. SCANTRAXX records came up with the idea to take a model, named Gostosa from Brazil, to make their label / the hardstyle scene, more popular. Gostosa and Headhunterz had their performance together on Q-Base. Click here for some comments (Dutch) Official site: http://www.djgostosa.com/ Read more on Last.fm
